attributes.action: Ban Commercial Vans from motorway fast lanes, also HGV's from the 3rd and 4th lanes.
attributes.additional_details:
In the interest of Safety, Ban Commercial Vans over 1800mm Height from the fast lane of motorways, also where a motorway has more than 3 lanes, ban HGV's from the 3rd and 4th lanes.
This in my view would help reduce accidents, and improve the flow of traffic on motorways
